channel.title: Noise Shader cannot be disabled
channel.description:
Unchecking Enable Noise Shader does not actually disable it. The definition I found say: Creates a static noise shader effect when near or in radioactive sources.
Well, I'm near radioactive sources, and it will not go away. Tried load-reload-shutting down the game and opening it up again, its still enabled.
The various cl_post_process_ commands all at 0, the noise is -still- there.
